setDetails.setDescription:
DEFI Crypto 8 Index (DEFI8) is a rules based, equal-weighted index strategy that tracks the performance of the eight largest tokens in the decentralized financial industry.

OBJECTIVE
Decentralized finance is one of the fastest growing segments in the crypto ecosystem. There are literally hundreds of DeFi cryptos for investors to choose from in the market. However, all these choices can add cost and complexity when making decisions. DEFI Crypto 8 Index (DEFI8) can eliminate this complexity and ease the process for crypto investors. It provides a way to track the performance of the decentralized finance market as a whole by holding a single token.

INDEX STRATEGY
We use a rules based, systematic approach to screen tokens that meets the following criteria:

Associated with a decentralized finance protocol such as lending, swaps, staking, payments, synthetics.
The token must be available on the Ethereum blockchain.
Not a stable coin or cannot be fiat-pegged.
Sufficient liquidity on the Polygon network.

After screening, select the top eight tokens based on market-capitalization (circulating supply number x price) and allocate equally in the index.

INDEX MAINTENANCE
The index is maintained monthly in two phases. The first phase takes place during the last week of the month, which is to determine any tokens addition or deletion based on the index screening and selection strategy.The second phase takes place on the first business day of the month, which is to reconstitute and rebalance the index. During the second phase, additions or deletions determined from the first phase are incorporated into the index and all the holdings are readjusted to equal weight.

FEE STRUCTURE
The Index will have an annual management fee of 1%. The management fee scales linearly up from 0 over the duration of 1 year (365 days).
setDetails.managerDescription: iTHINK Portfolios is a crypto asset manager specializing in smart Beta indexing strategies. We use a rules based, systematic approach to build our index portfolios.
